aws_datasync_location_efs.description: Manages an EFS Location within AWS DataSync.

ec2_config.description: Configuration block containing EC2 configurations for connecting to the EFS File System.

subdirectory.description: Subdirectory to perform actions as source or destination. Default `/`.

tags.description: Key-value pairs of resource tags to assign to the DataSync Location.

id.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the DataSync Location.

arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the DataSync Location.
